#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
    long long int t,x,y;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>x>>y;
        if((x+y)%5!=0)
        {
            cout<<"-1\n";
        }
        else
        {
            cout<<abs(3*x-2*y)/5<<"\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
